gtrends_{variant}.long_name: Google Trends Search Volume of Term {variant}
gtrends_{variant}.short_description: Google search volume of the term {variant}.
gtrends_{variant}.long_description: Google trends search volume of the term {variant}. Values are the probabilities of a short search session including the term within the geography and timeframe, multiplied by 10 million.
gtrends_{variant}.statement: There is a {value} / 10M chance of a short search session including the term {variant}

sources.name: Google Trends
sources.location: Yale Data-Intensive Social Sciences, Google Trends Collection Framework
sources.description: Google Trends data represent scaled Google search volume by week and state or metropolitan area and are obtained from the Google Health Trends API for non-commercial purposes.
